description: Establishes universal, non-negotiable prohibitions on specific high-risk tools. These rules apply to all agents and roles without exception.

rules.description: The `reset_all` tool is unconditionally forbidden. It is a deprecated, high-risk tool that has been superseded by safer alternatives. Its use is a critical failure condition.
rules.enforcement: The core system orchestrator will programmatically block any planned or direct call to this tool and terminate the task.
